name: Android Sketches
description:
SCHIZOID BAND presents:

ANDROID SKETCHES

SIDE B track 2 

Album INITIATION

2014

Android Sketches is a short game inspired in my daughter, Alice. 

You is an introspective android in existential crisis. The game is very simple by lack of knowledge in programmer language, but was very cool developed it.

_

schizoid band

game by andre teruya eichemberg

sound design by sabrina maia

Time of development: 1 month
